content: {"name": "Bookman Readers (Summer Meal Site)", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6601 Germantown Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Northwest Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19119", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0496575, "longitude": -75.1838836}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "14:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Program runs 6/21/22 to 8/26/22"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Text FOOD to 304304"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}]}
